select.description: Which item are you going to inquire about?

bug.label: bug

suggestions.label: suggestion
suggestions.description: You can inquire about any inconveniences or additional features you had while using Doremi.

other.label: other

embeds.second: I set the slow mode for this channel to {time} second.
embeds.minute: I set the slow mode for this channel to {time} minute.
embeds.hour: I set the slow mode for this channel to {time} hour.
embeds.error: Failed to set slow mode for this channel. You need to have one of the three options.

error.minute: The value of `time` must be less than 360.
